芐字的基本解释

芐
hù
即地黄，一种药草。

芐
xià
蒲席：“芐剪不纳。”
姓。

芐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hù］
［《廣韻》侯古切，上姥，匣。］
(1)草名。即地黄。
(2)通“苦”。苦荼。
[②]［xià］
［《廣韻》胡駕切，去禡，匣。］
蒲萍。可制席。

芐字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芐； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1018第18
【唐韻】?古切【集韻】後五切，?音戸。【說文】地黃也。【爾雅·釋草】芐，地黃。【註】芐，一名地髓。【韻會】引《爾雅翼》云：地黃生者，以水試之，浮者名天黃，半沈半浮者人黃，沈者地黃。芐字从下，亦趨下之義。　又【禮·閒傳】芐剪不納。【疏】芐爲蒲苹，爲席，剪頭爲之，不編納其頭而藏于內也。　又【唐韻】胡駕切【韻會】亥駕切，?音暇。義同。　【集韻】亦作芦。

芐字的起名意思

暂无。

Benzyl
Basic explanation of words
Benzyl
hù
Namely Rehmannia, a kind of herb.
Benzyl
xià
Pu Xi: "Benzine can't be cut."
name.
Benzyl
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hù］
["Guangyun" Hou Guqie, Shangma, Xie. ]
(1) Cursive name. That is, Rehmannia glutinosa.
(2) Through "bitter". Bitter tea.
[②]［xià］
["Guangyun" Hu Jiaqie, go to 禡, box. ]
Pu Ping. Can be seated.
Benzyl
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese characters] 　benz; Kangxi strokes: 9; page number: page 1018 to 18
[Tang Yun]? Ancient cut [Ji Yun] back five cuts,? Yindo. [Said the text] Rehmannia glutinosa also. [Erya Shicao] Benzene, Rehmannia glutinosa. [Note] Benzene, a name of the earth marrow. [Rhyme will] quote from "Er Yayi": Those who are born with rehmannia glutinosa, use water to test it, those who float are named Tianhuang, those who are half-sinking and half-floating are yellow, and those who sink are rehmannia. From the bottom, the word benze also tends to mean downward.　[Rite·Xianzhuan] I can’t accept the benzine cut. 【Sparse】Benzine is Pu Ping, serving as a seat, cutting the head for it, and hiding it inside without compiling its head.　[Tang Yun] Hu Jiaqie [Yunhui] Haijiaqie,? Yin Xia. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】also used as reed.
Benzyl
